situations.title: Child Having a Meltdown
scripts: You're safe. Take your time. I'm right here.
I can hold this with you.
You don't have to handle this alone.
Your feelings are big right now, and that's okay. I'm staying with you.
Let's take some breaths together. You're safe.
principles: Co-regulation: Your calm becomes their calm
A dysregulated child can't learn or connect

situations.title: Defiance or Refusal
scripts: I hear that you don't want to. Let's figure this out together.
It seems like this feels hard for you right now.
You're safe with me, even when you're upset.
I'm not trying to control you‚ÄîI'm trying to keep you safe.
What do you need right now?
principles: Calm authority is power with, not power over

situations.title: Setting a Boundary
scripts: I won't let you hurt anyone. Let's take a break until you're ready to be safe.
I care about you too much to let you act that way, but I'm still right here.
Here's what's safe, and I'll help you get there.
This is the limit, and I'm going to hold it because I love you.
I know what will happen if I do this. I know the adults will still care about me afterward.

situations.title: Challenging Behavior
scripts: What's this behavior trying to tell me?
This behavior is communication, not character.
It seems mornings are hard for you. Let's figure out what would help.
You got angry when plans changed. That makes sense‚Äîyou've had to handle a lot of surprises in life.
Do you still see me?
principles: Behavior is not the problem; it's the signal

situations.title: After a Conflict
scripts: That was a tough moment. I care about you too much to let you act that way, but I'm still right here.
I got frustrated and raised my voice. That's not how I want to handle hard moments. Let's both take a breath and start again.
We both got upset. Let's try again.
I'm sorry I lost my cool. You deserve better from me.
Mistakes can be repaired. Let's figure this out together.
principles: Containment is never about perfection‚Äîit's about recovery
Big feelings don't make people leave

situations.title: Teaching Responsibility
scripts: Let's pause. Take a breath. Now say that in a respectful voice.
You made a mistake, and you can learn.
You can learn from this.
What could you do differently next time?
Mistakes are opportunities to learn and practice.

situations.title: Difficult Transitions
scripts: I know changes are hard. Here's what's happening next.
Transitions can feel scary. I'm here to help you through it.
Let's talk about what's coming so you know what to expect.
You've handled hard changes before. You can do this.
I'll be with you the whole time.

situations.title: Building Identity & Worth
scripts: I see you.
You are capable.
You are worthy of love.
You are more than your behaviors.
I'm proud of how hard you're trying.
You belong here.
principles: Identity is built through repeated experiences
You are teaching who they are

situations.title: When You're Overwhelmed
scripts: I need to take a breath before I respond.
Let me pause and ground myself.
I'm feeling overwhelmed. Let's both take a moment.
I need to calm my own nervous system first.
I'm going to step away for a minute so I can be the parent you need.
principles: Your nervous system is the model
You can't pour from an empty cup

quickPrinciples: Co-regulation: Your calm becomes their calm
Safety is the foundation of all healing
